experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Questing Minds is a Jodhpur-based community for people in their 20s, often the most curious and confused individuals on the planet. Whether you are a student, working, building your own venture, or still figuring things out, this community is for you. Join us to share experiences, learn from one another, and build connections through lively discussions
